abstract.p: Partial list of pick-your-own strawberry fields in Connecticut; photo (S)

block.p: STRAWBERRY fields can be found in every county in Connecticut.

To get a complete list of the pick-your-own farms, visit the State Department of Agriculture Web site at www.state.ct. us/doag/ or send a self-addressed stamped No. 10 envelope to the Department of Agriculture, Marketing Division, 765 Asylum Avenue, Hartford 06106.
STRAWBERRY fields can be found in every county in Connecticut.

To get a complete list of the pick-your-own farms, visit the State Department of Agriculture Web site at www.state.ct. us/doag/ or send a self-addressed stamped No. 10 envelope to the Department of Agriculture, Marketing Division, 765 Asylum Avenue, Hartford 06106.
Here is a sampling of some of the state's pick-your-own strawberry farms.
It is a good idea to call to find out the hours a farm is open, and what's available. It's also wise to check the weather and dress appropriately.
